name: Medieval Missiles
description:
Medieval Missiles is a cartoony casual game. In it, you try to defend your castle from incoming evil warriors by shooting them with rockets as a turret. However, you need to let the villagers in to expand your empire. To top it all off, you need to collect hearts to heal your castle and diffuse bombs to keep your castle safe. How well can you defend your fort?

MOBILE DEVICES NOT SUPPORTED

NOTE: The executable has more visual effects/particles than the browser version.
